name: wp9768627_1759762694.jpg
description: So this is what i was able to do. Description accepts html, so this link is the link to login. I have emailed you the username and password for now.

name: 75379_1759762927.gif
description: The images are saved in a github repo (for this example, its here). You will also need a github token, with just "repo" scope - im using mine atm. Tokens can be made on github. Do no share it with anyone. It will set as an environment variable on vercel.

name: study_1759763453.jpg
description: To have this site on your domain, you will need to fork the repo with this code (its private for now, since my github token was there initially, i have to delete commit history). Then deploy a vercel app and point it to your domain. You can google it, or I'll help you out with that.

name: 1724013756277751_1759763698.png
description:
So, there will be two github repos in total:
  • Your site's code
  • Images storage
Both can be private/public or any combination as such.

name: 18_1759763943.jpg
description: Oh also, do let me know how you want the feed to be, like latest images must be at the top (like how it is now) or at the bottom.
